update city
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Parent_Id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Short_Name = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LevelType = #{leveltype,jdbcType=CHAR},

lng = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
